name: Pink, Green, Orange and Blue
description:
Game made for Brackeys jam 2021 in 4 days! Little puzzle game I had so much fun making! Thanks for playing, enjoy!

Theme: Stronger Together

Important Note:

Consider downloading the game for best experience.

This game was made using Unity, but all physics were implemented in code, so if anything unexpected happend (box or player entering tile, ...), please just press "R" to restart level or “I” to skip it and all will be fine, I did not have time to fix all bugs and WebGL can be inconsistent. Thank you for your comprehension!

Controls:

  • A/D - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Grab (only pink guy)
  • R - Restart level
  • I - Next level
  • F - Press button

Rules:

  • Get to the flag (any player)
  • Only players that match the button color can press it

Made by:

  • gubebra (https://gubebra.itch.io/)

Art:

https://s4m-ur4i.itch.io/free-sprites-elements-8x8-retro-pixelart-platformer-brawler (Really talented guy)
